resources.string:
Rules: 
- press START button to begin game 
- spin minute hand to set required time 
- you only have 10 seconds to do this!

This app is designed for training purpose. 
Learning Objectives: 
- learn NavigationUI: Up Button, Navigation Drawer, Navigation Graph, Slide Animation 
- learn ViewModel architecture 
- learn to create ViewModel using ViewModelProvider 
- learn to implement Observer Pattern 
- data binding between ViewModel and layout.xml 
- playback sound 
- learn to create custom view
